recipe_text: Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 tomatoes, tops cut off and insides scooped out| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of breadcrumbs| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of grated parmesan cheese| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of Italian seasoning| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of salt| Measurement; 1; Measure out 1 gram of black pepper| Untimed; None; In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Stuff the mixture into the hollowed-out tomatoes| Untimed; None; Preheat air fryer to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Place stuffed tomatoes in the air fryer basket| Timed; 1200; Cook in the preheated air fryer for 20 minutes, or until tomatoes are tender and topping is golden brown| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Air Fried Italian Stuffed Tomatoes
